channel.title: 线性代数 on xiaoJiao
channel.description: Recent content in 线性代数 on xiaoJiao

item.title: 行列式
item.description: 二阶行列式 1 $$ \left| \begin{array}{cccc} 1 & 0 & 0 \ -5 & 2 & 3\ 3 & 3 & 5 \end{array} \right| $$ 2 $ \left[ \begin{array}{cccc} 1 & 2 & \cdots & 4 \ 7 & 6 &{\cdot^{\cdot^{\cdot}}} & 5 \ \vdots & \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \ 8 & 9 & \cdots & 0 \ \end{array} \right] $ 3 $$ \left| \begin{array}{cccc} 1 & 0 & 0 \\ -5 & 2 & 3\\ 3 & 3 & 5 \end{array} \right| $$ 4 $\sum_{i=0}^N\int_{a}^{b}g(t,i)\text{d}t$ 5 $$\sum_{i=0}N\int_{a}{b}g(t,i)\text{d}t$$ 6 $$\begin{cases} a_1x+b_1y+c_1z=d_1\ a_2x+b_2y+c_2z=d_2\ a_3x+b_3y+c_3z=d_3\ \end{cases} $$
